58c7f864eeaca.Name: GTEC007 - DD PDF
58c7f864eeaca.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
New Council Tax - Direct Debit application ({reference})
{#DP_Para}

Before you complete this form

A Direct Debit requires up to 10 days' notice. If there are fewer than 10 days until the next payment, the next payment may not be until the subsequent instalment date and therefore instalments may be larger.


A Direct Debit requires up to 10 days notice. If there are fewer than 10 days until the next payment, the next payment may not be until the subsequent instalment date and therefore instalments may be larger.

Direct Debit Setup

Instruction to your Bank or Building Society to pay by Direct Debit

A Direct Debit requires up to 10 days' notice. If there are fewer than 10 days until the next payment, the next payment may not be until the subsequent date and therefore instalments may be larger.

Bank Details

Are you authorised to arrange Direct Debit payments from this account? {DD_Det/DDAuthorised}
Are multiple signatures required to setup a Direct Debit on your account? {DD_Det/areMultipleSignatu}
@af:if({DDAuthorised} = 'no')

Please provide the details of an account that you are authorised to use.

@endaf:if
@af:if({areMultipleSignatu} = 'yes')

Unfortunately you cannot complete this process online. Please click on the following link, then print and complete the form. The form can the be sent to the address provided, or as an attachment via email to localtaxation@portsmouthcc.gov.uk Postal application.

@endaf:if
@af:if({MultipleSignatures} = 'yes')

We can't setup Direct Debit payments online for accounts requiring multiple signatures. Please follow the link to print the mandate form Direct Debit Mandate. then complete and post to the address included or email to localtaxation@portsmouthcc.gov.uk

@endaf:if
@af:if({areMultipleSignatu} != 'yes')
Name of Bank Account Holder(s) {DD_Det/BankAccountHolder}
Account Number {DD_Det/accountNumber_in}
Sort Code {DD_Det/sortCode}
How often do you want to pay {DD_Det/PayFrequency}
@endaf:if
@af:if({frequencyCheck} = 'Other')
{PayFrequency:notes}
@endaf:if
@af:if({frequencyCheck} = 'Month')
Payment day of month {DD_Det/DayOfMonth}
@endaf:if
{#DD_Guarantee}
Title {custdetails/Title_out}
First name{firstNamePlural} {custdetails/First_Name_out}
Last name {custdetails/Surname_out}
Address {custdetails/AdTextArea_out}
Email Address {custdetails/Email_Address_out}
Telephone Number {custdetails/Phone_Number_out}
Mobile Number {custdetails/Mobile_Number_out}
Council Tax Referance Number {xref_council_tax}
"}

579b3d5f1dcfe.Name: GTEC005 - GovTech DD Application Submission
579b3d5f1dcfe.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","method":"POST","url":"http://{govtechpath}","show_headers":"yes","headers":"{"user":"{govtechuser}", "password":"{govtechpassword}"}","payloadType":"XML","payload":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rev:FirmstepCTDirectDebit xmlns:rev="http://www.govtechsolutions.co.uk/schema/revenues" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" >
	<rev:Header>
		<rev:Authority>{govtechauthoritycode}</rev:Authority>
		<rev:DocumentSource>{form_name}</rev:DocumentSource>
		<rev:DocumentReference>{reference}</rev:DocumentReference>
		<rev:SubmissionDate>{today}</rev:SubmissionDate>
		<rev:Environment>{Enviroment}</rev:Environment><!--I don't always test, but when I do it's in LIVE or DEV or TEST-->
		<rev:Route>DIRECT</rev:Route><!-- DIRECT = open, PORTAL = authenticated-->
		<rev:PDF>
			<rev:Document>{prev_data_64}</rev:Document>
		</rev:PDF>
		<rev:FormType>CTaxDirectDebitInstruction</rev:FormType>		
	</rev:Header>
	<rev:Contact>
		<rev:Name>
			<rev:Title>{custdetails/Title_out}</rev:Title>
			<rev:Forename>{custdetails/First_Name_out}</rev:Forename><!--optional-->
			<rev:Surname>{custdetails/Surname_out}</rev:Surname>
		</rev:Name>
		<rev:EmailAddress>{custdetails/Email_Address_out}</rev:EmailAddress>
		<!--@af:if({custdetails/Phone_Number}!='') -->
		<rev:TelephoneNumber>{custdetails/Phone_Number_out}</rev:TelephoneNumber><!--must have tel, email, or both-->
		<!--@endaf:if -->
		<!--@af:if({custdetails/Phone_Number}='') -->
		<rev:TelephoneNumber>{custdetails/Mobile_Number_out}</rev:TelephoneNumber><!--must have tel, email, or both-->
		<!--@endaf:if -->
	</rev:Contact>
	<rev:Address>
		<rev:Address>
			<rev:Line1>{custdetails/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
			<rev:Line2>{custdetails/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
			<rev:Line3>{custdetails/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
			<rev:Line4>{custdetails/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
			<rev:Postcode>{custdetails/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
			<!-- <rev:NonStdPostcode></rev:NonStdPostcode> alternative to Postcode, must have one or other -->
		</rev:Address>
		<!-- <rev:PropertyRef>blah</rev:PropertyRef> -->
		<rev:UPRN>{custdetails/uprn_out}</rev:UPRN>
	</rev:Address>
	<rev:AccountRef>{xref_council_tax}</rev:AccountRef> <!--optional-->
	<rev:DirectDebitDetails>
		<rev:PreferredNumberOfInstalments>{DD_Det/noOfInstallments}</rev:PreferredNumberOfInstalments> <!--installments per year -->
		<!--@af:if({DD_Det/DayOfMonth}!='') -->
		<rev:PaymentDay>{DD_Det/DayOfMonth}</rev:PaymentDay><!--day of month for payments, optional-->
		<!--@endaf:if -->
		<rev:BankAccountDetails>
			<rev:AccountHolderName>{DD_Det/BankAccountHolder}</rev:AccountHolderName>
			<rev:AccountNumber>{DD_Det/accountNumber}</rev:AccountNumber>
			<rev:SortCode>{DD_Det/sortCodeNoSpaces}</rev:SortCode>
			<!--@af:if({MultipleSignatures}='yes') -->
			<rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>true</rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>
			<!--@endaf:if -->
			<!--@af:if({MultipleSignatures}!='yes') -->
			<rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>false</rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>
			<!--@endaf:if -->
		</rev:BankAccountDetails>
		<rev:OriginatorIdentificationNumber>{govtechoriginatorid}</rev:OriginatorIdentificationNumber>
	</rev:DirectDebitDetails>
	<rev:DeclarationCompleted>true</rev:DeclarationCompleted>
</rev:FirmstepCTDirectDebit>","responseType":"XML","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}

58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ',''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Before you complete this form

A Direct Debit requires up to 10 days' notice. If there are fewer than 10 days until the next payment, the next payment may not be until the subsequent instalment date and therefore instalments may be larger.

submission.message:
Your reference number is {summary_ref}.

Thank you for submitting {form_name}

{visiblesummary}

props.label: html 10
props.content:
Direct Debit Setup

Instruction to your Bank or Building Society to pay by Direct Debit

A Direct Debit requires up to 10 days' notice. If there are fewer than 10 days until the next payment, the next payment may not be until the subsequent date and therefore instalments may be larger.

Bank Details

props.label: Are you authorised to arrange Direct Debit payments from this account?
Are multiple signatures required to setup a Direct Debit on your account?
staticText 6
props.content: Please providethe details of an account that you are authorised to use.

props.label: html 11
props.content:
Unfortunately you cannot complete this process online. Please click on the following link, then print and complete the form. The form can the be sent to the address provided.

Postal application.

props.label: html 3
props.content: We can't setup Direct Debit payments online for accounts requiring multiple signatures. Please follow the link to print the mandate form Direct Debit Mandate. then complete and post to the address included

props.label: emailMain
props.defaultValue:
concat({#emailStart},'Dear ',{Customer_Details/Title},' ',{Customer_Details/Surname},',\n
\n
\n
Thank you for arranging to pay your Council Tax by Direct Debit using My Portsmouth.\n
\n
Our local taxation team will process this as soon as possible. If you previously paid Council Tax by another method, or have amended the payment date for an existing Direct Debit, we will send you an updated bill by post soon.\n
\n
A copy of the Direct Debit guarantee can be found at the bottom of this email.\n
\n
Your reference number is ',{reference},'.\n
\n
This is an automated response - please do not reply to this email.\n
\n
\n
Regards, \n
\n
Portsmouth City Council\n
\n',
{#DD_Guarantee},{#emailEnd})
